attributes.action: Devise A New Scheme That Actually Helps Single People Whilst They're Working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm currently receiving working tax credits, well was. Due to a mistake thats not my own I'm now short of over £700 month because they have over paid me. I was already working for only £30 a month once all bills and childcare were paid but now £730 short. Why should I work when you get hardly any help and my finances are not in my control when all I've done is be honest with the amount I've earnt! I'm sure theres many stories like these....If you know anyone who has had simiular problem please sign this petition.!!!
